channel.title: New Hitmarkers Problem
channel.description: Hi, I followed this tutorial > [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,516825.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,516825.0.html[/url] and everythign worked out great. the only problem is when i attack something, instead of seeing the numbers, i see this: [img]http://gyazo.com/c738714656511a3b87358dcda1271ecb.png?1331537776[/img] I have added the fonts in the place he told me to and that what i get. If you know how to fix this, please let me know!
